title: Custom Jet Squelcher
paragraphs: The Custom Jet Squelcher is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is the Custom version of the Jet Squelcher.

In Splatoon and Splatoon 2, The Custom Jet Squelcher is nearly identical in appearance to the Jet Squelcher, with the only difference being that the Custom Jet Squelcher has a sticker on the bottom part bearing the Custom logo.
In Splatoon 3, the color of the Custom Jet Squelcher's nozzle has been changed from dull white to yellow.
The Custom Jet Squelcher is identical to the Jet Squelcher, but has the Burst Bomb as a sub weapon and the Kraken as a special.
- Promotional image
- Official art of an Inkling holding the Custom Jet Squelcher.
- An Inkling with the Custom Jet Squelcher equipped.
- An Inkling holding the Custom Jet Squelcher in gameplay.
- The Custom Jet Squelcher's range in the testing area.
- SplatNet icon
The Custom Jet Squelcher returns in Splatoon 2 looking identical to how it did in the first game. It was released on 3 November 2017 at 02:00 UTC[2]. It comes with Burst Bombs and Sting Ray.
- Throwing Burst Bomb
- Holding the Custom Jet Squelcher

The Custom Jet Squelcher returns in Splatoon 3. It functions the same as the normal Jet Squelcher, but has a different kit and appearance. It has a Custom sticker on the side, and features a yellow tip at the end, rather than the traditional gray. Its kit is Toxic Mist and the Ink Storm. The weapon was teased to return in the Fresh Season poster shown on 16 February 2023, as well as in a promotional video for the Super Chump special shown on 17 February 2023. The weapon was released on 1 March 2023.
- The Custom Jet Squelcher being shown off in the Fresh Season 2023 promotional poster.
- An Inkling using the Custom Jet Squelcher while surrounded by Super Chump balloons.
